$H_0$ : Linea B = promedio de Otras

$H_1$ : Linea B $\neq$ Otras

Uno mas uno es igual a dos

1+1=2

```{r}
my_table <- tbl(con,"subte_caba")
my_summary <- my_table %>% 
  group_by(FECHA, LINEA) %>% 
  summarize(
    pasajeros = sum(pax_TOTAL, na.rm = TRUE)
    ) %>% 
  collect()
```
```{r}
lineaB <-
  my_summary %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(LINEA == "LineaB") %>% 
  slice_sample(n=20)
```


```{r}
lineaNoB <-
  my_summary %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  filter(LINEA != "LineaB") %>% 
  slice_sample(n=20)
```
